title: New: Nicolas Jaar – With Just One Glance You (Feat. Scout Larue)
content:
Up until Gorilla vs Bear pointed everyone in the right direction, this new cut from Nicolas Jaar went somewhat under the radar. Featuring vocals from Scout Larue, the daughter of Bruce Willis and Demi Moore, it’s seemingly picks up where Jaar left off on Darkside. Whilst the sampled vocals underneath hark back to Space Is Only Noise, the minimal, languid production points to a future, darker sound. Try telling me you aren’t falling in love. Check out With Just One Glance You below.

Nicolas Jaae – With Just One Glance You (Feat. Scout Larue) by crackintheroad
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
